channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-26936] On yarn-client mode, insert overwrite local directory can not create temporary path in local staging directory
item.description:
Let me introduce bug of  'insert overwrite local directory'.

If I execute the SQL mentioned before, a HiveException will appear as follows:

Driver stacktrace:

item.summary: On yarn-client mode, insert overwrite local directory can not create temporary path in local staging directory

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Issue resolved by pull request 23841
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/23841
